items.q: In the game 'Elden Ring', who directed the game with worldbuilding provided by George R. R. Martin?
items.explanation: He is the president of FromSoftware and creator of the Souls series.

items.q: The objective in the game of Dominoes is to build a tall tower using the pieces.
items.explanation: The objective is traditionally to lay down dominoes by matching numbers on their ends.

items.q: In the classic game of 'Operation', players use plastic tweezers to carefully remove body parts.
items.explanation: The tweezers are metal. Touching the metal edge completes a circuit and triggers a buzzer.

items.q: What popular 1997 role-playing game features Cloud Strife fighting the megacorporation Shinra?
items.explanation: Its cinematic cutscenes and 3D graphics popularized RPGs in the West.

items.q: Which famous real-time strategy series involves choosing between the Terran, Zerg, and Protoss factions?
items.explanation: It profoundly influenced the development of global esports, especially in South Korea.

items.q: What is the name of the popular party game where players try to secretly identify the Mafia members hidden among the townsfolk?
items.explanation: It is a game of social deduction where informed minorities battle uninformed majorities.

items.q: In the card game 'Hearts', which specific card carries a devastating penalty of 13 points?
items.explanation: The goal is usually to avoid taking any hearts or the Queen of Spades.

items.q: Which highly influential video game created by Sid Meier tasks the player with building an empire from the Stone Age to the Information Age?
items.explanation: It heavily defined the 4X strategy game genre.

items.q: What popular board game involves buying, selling, and building on properties to bankrupt opponents?
items.explanation: The game was originally designed to teach people about the dangers of land monopolies.

items.q: What critically acclaimed 2011 video game tasks players with exploring the frozen fantasy province of Skyrim?
items.explanation: The player takes on the role of the Dragonborn to defeat Alduin the World-Eater.
